entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:39 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
